.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/language-Unix%20Shell-blue.svg
    :target: none

|

Install
```````


.. code:: bash

    `[sudo] pip install mktouch`

Examples
````````


.. code:: bash

    $ mktouch /tmp/dir1/dir2/dir3/file
    + mkdir -p /tmp/dir1/dir2/dir3
    + touch /tmp/dir1/dir2/dir3/file
